sense.gloss: to expose (a secret), to disclose, to reveal, to lay bare, to let out, to give away
to take apart, to take to pieces, to disassemble
to kill, to do away with, to get rid of
to let (a fish) get away, to lose (a fish) from the hook

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を|ばらす|と↑脅↑↓おど↓しをかけた。
sdata.e: I threatened to reveal his secret.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑内幕↑↓うちまく↓を|ばらす|といっていますよ。
sdata.e: He says he'll blow the story open.

sdata.j: ↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を|ばらす|かもしれん。
